
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/morec/p/19054429" title="发布于 2025-08-23 14:19">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">claude code使用</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>白嫖了cursor半年多了，虽然免费的模型能满足日常开发，但是完成一个任务还是需要不停的修修改改，浪费的时间基本上太多了。<br>听说claude code很强大，先试试它了。</p>
<p>claude code刚出来的时候都是在mac上的，作为windows系统深度使用者，默默掏出了子系统linux,具体安装省略。</p>
<p>cmd命令开启一个控制台输入wsl.exe -d Ubuntu打开linux,然后在系统中创建工作目录或者在windows目录中提前创建好工作目录，在该目录中进入linux。</p>
<div class="cnblogs_Highlighter">
<pre class="brush:csharp;gutter:true;">export ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN=你的免费有额度的apikey,
export ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://anyrouter.top, //写死
claudek　</pre>
</div>
<p>看到上面的链接就知道了时使用的是https://anyrouter.top白嫖，注册后有120块的额度，创建apikey的时候注意一下即可，合理利用吧<br><img alt="Snipaste_2025-08-23_13-49-48" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202508/1099890-20250823135058221-1573289123.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="Snipaste_2025-08-23_13-50-38" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202508/1099890-20250823135113479-662995056.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="Snipaste_2025-08-23_13-51-32" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202508/1099890-20250823135139959-1439308944.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>上面的这种使用很不稳定，apikey时不时的失效，所以下面再说另一种claude code的白嫖<br><br>下面直接在windows上安装claude code，首先你电脑要有node.js，然后运行npm&nbsp; install&nbsp; -g&nbsp; @anthropic-ai/claude-code 即可，然后按照要求初始化一下claude，注意登陆方式（select login method）不要付费的claude，选择api调用模式（claude account with subscription,下面就是白嫖apikey了。<br>去这里拿到配置文件<br><a href="https://github.com/musistudio/claude-code-router" rel="noopener nofollow">musistudio/claude-code-router: Use Claude Code as the foundation for coding infrastructure, allowing you to decide how to interact with the model while enjoying updates from Anthropic.<br><img alt="Snipaste_2025-08-23_13-59-53" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202508/1099890-20250823140005381-926179946.jpg" class="lazyload"></a></p>
<p>然后存入到C:\Users\你的电脑用户名\.claude-code-router中，.claude-code-router没有需要创建这个目录，然后配置文件改名config.json，我的文件内容如下，按照自己需要改</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">{
  </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Providers</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: [
       {
      </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">modelscope</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
      </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">api_base_url</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">https://api-inference.modelscope.cn/v1/chat/completions</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
      </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">api_key</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"拿你自己的</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">apikey</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
      </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">models</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: [<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Qwen/Qwen3-Coder-480B-A35B-Instruct</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Qwen/Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">],
      </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">transformer</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: {
        </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">use</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: [
          [
            </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">maxtoken</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
            {
              </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">max_tokens</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">65536</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
            }
          ],
          </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">enhancetool</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
        ],
        </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Qwen/Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: {
          </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">use</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: [<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">reasoning</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
        }
      }
    }
    ],
  </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Router</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: {
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">default</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">modelscope,Qwen/Qwen3-Coder-480B-A35B-Instruct</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
     }
  }</span></pre>
</div>
<p>这里白嫖的是魔塔社区的apikey.,每天2000次免费，前提绑定阿里云账号<br><img alt="Snipaste_2025-08-23_14-03-51" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202508/1099890-20250823140520321-2111394398.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>cmd打开一个控制台命令窗口，使用ccr code运行claude,然后可以愉快的让她做你的牛马了,这个apikey比较稳定，可以满足日常开发。<br><br></p>
<p><img alt="Snipaste_2025-08-23_14-07-36" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202508/1099890-20250823140743201-646582337.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>下面说一下通过本地模型来使用类似的claude code，代码就这么多。<br><img alt="Snipaste_2025-08-23_14-11-00" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202508/1099890-20250823141142032-1176677727.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>电脑配置不够本地模型只能跑qwen2.5-coder:7b</p>
<p><img alt="Snipaste_2025-08-23_14-12-22" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202508/1099890-20250823141228668-592614022.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img alt="Snipaste_2025-08-23_14-16-15" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202508/1099890-20250823141644718-524999104.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="Snipaste_2025-08-23_14-16-32" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1099890/202508/1099890-20250823141649484-954201669.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>源代码链接：<a href="https://github.com/liuzhixin405/ReActAgent-NetCore" rel="noopener nofollow">liuzhixin405/ReActAgent-NetCore</a><br><br></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
